item.title: Show HN：Agententshield SDK - 代理AI应用程序的运行时安全性
item.description:
Hi HN,We built AgentShield, a Python SDK and CLI to add a security checkpoint for AI agents before they perform potentially risky actions like external API calls or executing generated code.Problem: Agents calling arbitrary URLs or running unchecked code can lead to data leaks, SSRF, system damage, etc.Solution: AgentShield intercepts these actions:- guarded_get（url = ...）：检查策略（块内部IP，http等） 致电以评估针对可配置的安全策略的操作。它包括常见风险的默认策略。入门：安装： PIP安装AdmentHield-SDK 获取API键（CLI）： AgentShield键创建在Python中使用： 来自AgentShield_SDK Import AgentShield ＃shield = agententshield（api_key = ...） ＃等待Shield.guarded_get（url = ...） ＃await shield.safe_execute（code_snippet = ...） 完整的详细信息，文档和完整的读数为
评论URL： https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=438991111 点：1 ＃评论：0
